section.p: This release replaces Docker Engine 1.12.1 with Docker Community Edition (CE) 17.03.1. The upgrade instructions include steps to remove the yum repository description for Docker and replace it with the repository description for Docker Community Edition (Docker CE).

In addition, the following new configuration variables are available in /etc/default/serviced, for tuning TCP/IP communications between a ZooKeeper ensemble and clients in remote resource pools:
SERVICED_ZK_CONNECT_TIMEOUT SERVICED_ZK_PER_HOST_CONNECT_DELAY SERVICED_ZK_RECONNECT_START_DELAY SERVICED_ZK_RECONNECT_MAX_DELAY For more information, see .
